mapper.select: SELECT "date","open","high","low","close","cumulativeVolume","sum" FROM ( SELECT deal_date AS "date", FIRST_VALUE(execution_price) OVER (PARTITION BY TO_CHAR(deal_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY deal_time ASC) AS "open", MAX(execution_price) OVER (PARTITION BY TO_CHAR(deal_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS "high", MIN(execution_price) OVER (PARTITION BY TO_CHAR(deal_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS "low", LAST_VALUE(execution_price) OVER (PARTITION BY TO_CHAR(deal_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY deal_time ASC ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING) AS "close", max(to_number(CUMULATIVE_DEAL_VOLUME)) OVER (PARTITION BY TO_CHAR(deal_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY deal_time ASC ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING) AS "cumulativeVolume", SUM(execution_price) OVER (PARTITION BY TO_CHAR(deal_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS "sum", ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY TO_CHAR(deal_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY deal_time ASC) AS rn FROM stock_data ) t WHERE t.rn = 1 ORDER BY "date"
